overview: Starting with a confrontation with a caged bird, a man confides his impressions, reflections and memories about the place where he is, the temporal confluences that occur there and the fragility with which memory is sustained. Little by little the man will build an imaginary that will allow him to shape a personal map in order to capture a humming that is lost in time.

production_companies.name: Universidad de Los Andes, Facultad de Humanidades y Educación - Escuela de Medios Audiovisuales

title: Canto de una jaula
